instruction: Give me a list of reasons why people overeat.
output:
- Stress
- Boredom
- Habit
- Depression or anxiety
- Hunger, even when not physically hungry
- Low self-esteem
- A way to manage difficult emotions
- Poor sleep quality
- Lack of physical activity
- Food cravings
- Easily accessible unhealthy food
- Emotional eating
- Rebelling against diet rules
- Unclear hunger and fullness signals
- Overestimating portion sizes 
- Unhealthful diet
- Food advertisements
- Social pressure to eat more
- Feeling deprived or restricted 
- Celebrations or gatherings
